name: Glossarey
author: Lubomir Herko

sections.description: Glossarey is a custom dictionary plugin for your wordpress site. It’s functionality is very basic – you create a list of your terms through admin Glossary post type, then when creating post you can use the shortcode generator button built in the WP Editor. Plugin will generate a link, which will display a tooltip on mousover action while hovering the link.
sections.installation:
1. Upload glossarey/ to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
